Subclasses of Metric in net.sourceforge.metrics.core
 class Avg
          An Avg is a number with an associated count of the datapoints it was calculated with, as well as the associated variance.
 class Max
          A Max is a number with an associated compilation unit and (optional) selection range.
 class Sum
